results.title: The Good, good, good, good life
results.creator_credit: Karl Holtsnider, Teleketics and Rolf Forsberg
results.brief_description: This film serves as a plea for restraint and conservation in the use of goods and services, through the story of a self-sufficient retired man whose modern family deluge him with modern appliances, re-do his homely living room and attempt to introduce him to the “good life”.

results.title: The Good woman of Bangkok
results.creator_credit: Dennis O'Rourke and O'Rourke and Associates Filmakers
results.brief_description: This disturbing and controversial portrait of Aoi, a reluctant prostitute on the streets of Bangkok, is a very personal piece of work from filmmmaker Dennis O’Rourke. The soul of this young woman is captured as she shares her life story with the camera as much as with the filmmaker. O’Rourke picked her up in a bar and paid a pimp for her services. They stayed in a cheap motel in the red-light district. What proceeds to be laid bare, is a searing portrait of prostitution and the self-loathing that it helps breed.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Dennis O’Rourke and O’Rourke and Associates Filmakers
results.description: This disturbing and controversial portrait of Aoi, a reluctant prostitute on the streets of Bangkok, is a very personal piece of work from filmmmaker Dennis O’Rourke. results.title: The Good news is water
results.brief_description: Outlines the work of UNICEF in providing a permanent, clear water supply to a village in Imo State in Eastern Nigeria. The installation of such a water supply will combat cholera, diarrhoea and guinea worm contracted from using contaminated water holes.
results.description: Outlines the work of UNICEF in providing a permanent, clear water supply to a village in Imo State in Eastern Nigeria. The installation of such a water supply will combat cholera, diarrhoea and guinea worm contracted from using contaminated water holes.

results.title: The Good food show. series 2
results.brief_description: Gabrielle Gate takes us through a series of episodes which focus not only on good eating, but good health also. The emphasis is on freshness, quality and the excellence of Australian produce. Guest chefs appear on the programs to offer the viewers a range of delicious recipes and ideas. The programs on this tape are: Fishy tales; The Humble spud; Sweet temptations and Something special.

results.title: The Good Food Cookbook
results.brief_description: The Good Food Cookbook will not only show you how to master all those cooking techniques which recipes never seem to explain, but also give you hundreds of practical tips and hints so that you can both buy, prepare and cook food so much more easily and enjoyably. Rated: G
